#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,j,k;
    char alp[27] = "zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba";
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
         scanf("%d",&n);
         char *p;
         if(n == 0)
         {
              p = alp + 26;
              printf("%s",p);
         }
         else
         {
             p = alp + 26;
             k = n/25;
             k++;
             j = n%25+1;
             if(j!=1)
             p -= j;
             while(k!=0)
               {printf("%s",p);
                p = alp;
               k--;}
             
         }
         printf("\n");
    }
    //system("pause");
    return 0;
}
